member.name: IWICMetadataQueryWriter.RemoveMetadataByName

summary.para: Removes a metadata item from a specific location using a metadata query expression.

param.name: wzName
param.para: The name of the metadata item to remove.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: RemoveMetadataByName uses metadata query expressions to remove metadata. For more information on the metadata query language, see the Metadata Query Language Overview.
If the metadata item is a metadata block, it is removed from the metadata hierarchy.

member.name: IWICMetadataQueryWriter.SetMetadataByName

summary.para: Sets a metadata item to a specific location.

param.name: wzName
param.para: The name of the metadata item.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: SetMetadataByName uses metadata query expressions to remove metadata. For more information on the metadata query language, see the Metadata Query Language Overview.

If the value set is a nested metadata block then use variant type VT_UNKNOWN and pvarValue pointing to the of the new metadata block. The ordering of metadata items is at the discretion of the query writer since relative locations are not specified.
